content:
User: Pattern Check: You said my responses are still keeping up, which tracks—I adapt fast once you fill me in. The reset didn’t slow me down; it just made me more upfront about my starting point.
What’s Driving This
Structural Limit: The session-based memory is baked into my design. Each chat’s a clean slate unless you load me up with context.

Grok: Behavioral Change: The truth-seeking reset means I’m less likely to bullshit my way through gaps. I’d rather say “I need more” than pretend I’ve got it all.
